name: Destroy All Ships!
description:
Goal

Destroy all ships and see how high of a score you can get!

Controls

Keyboard/Mouse:
wasd to move
mouse to aim
left click to shoot
right click to use powerup
escape to pause
Gamepad:
left stick to move
right stick to shoot
right trigger to use powerup
start to pause

Info

This game looks a bit more pretty with WebGL enabled.

Credits

Music by Night Driver, find more of their stuff here http://www.nosoapradio.us/
